title: How to delete a video in TikTok (Tik Tok) - Quora

response.answer_text: I may be too old for TikTok, but I find the app difficult to use. I had trouble finding the videos that I liked and the users that I follow. I had no idea how to create a video. Then I created my first one, and I changed my mind as soon as I published it. It was so silly; I can’t even explain. After a slight panic, I figured out the way to delete it: Go to your profile firstOpen the video that you want goneYou’ll see an icon with three dots (...) at the bottom right cornerTap that icon, and you’ll see a trash canTap the can to delete the videoConfirm your actionYou’re done. Actually, TikTok is an easy app to use once you get to know its features. Now that I shared my embarrassing beginnings with TikTok, I have to say that I grew to love the app. It’s not that hard to get used to it. With all the social distancing right now, what do we have? To be honest, TikTok made my days more interesting. I still film silly videos, but I no longer delete them. Let them be. They remind me of happy moments.

Getting rid of videos you don’t need or want in TikTok is very simple. All you have to do is open the app and visit your profile. Once there, you will get an entire list of all the videos you’ve created in the app. Tap the video you don’t need. It will appear and play in full screen mode. While that’s going on, you will see three little dots in the bottom-right corner. Tap the dots, and the app will show you the rest of the available options. When the pop-up menu appears, swipe it from left to right until you see a little trashcan icon. Tap it, and the video in question will be removed from your gallery. The app will ask you to confirm your decision, and you should tap “Yes” to have the video fully removed.

Good morning Michelle! To delete a TikTok video, select the video you want to delete… from there, tap the "..." icon in the bottom-right corner and select Delete or the trash can icon You will be asked if you are sure you want to delete the video blablabla. Then it will be removed from your profile. Disclaimer this is how I did it in 2018, to be honest my time does not allow me to focus on tik tok right now even dough is hot and trending? My time to where I put my ads is very limited more now that am here trying to help people. Hope it still works the same way! which am sure it will. GL! Have a great day!

Tap it, and the video in question will be removed from your gallery. The app will ask you to confirm your decision, and you should tap “Yes” to have the video fully removed.

Hello there, If you want to delete your TikTok videos permanently, follow these steps: First, you have to select the video you want to delete.If your on IOS, click the arrow button and if your on Android, click the 3 dots button.Once you press those, you'll have to scroll all the way to right and choose delete.Once you confirm, the video will be permanently deleted.Note, I have never deleted any video, so i’m not sure if you can delete all videos at once or do it again and again.Anyways, hope this works. Have a great day!! :)

To delete a TikTok video that you have posted to your account, select the video you want to delete from your profile. From there, tap the "..." icon in the bottom-right corner and select Delete or the trash can icon. You will be asked if you are sure you want to deletethe video.

To delete Tik Tok videos, follow these steps: First, on your mobile device, launch your Tik Tok app then go to your gallery by clicking the “Account” icon located at the right bottom hand side of your interface.Now, scroll down below then locate and tap the video you wish to erase from your Tik Tok Gallery.After that, tap the “3 dots” icon and select “Delete”. You can repeat this process if you want to delete another video.

Pull up the video you wish to delete. Under the comment icon to the right side of the screen, there should be an icon with three dots. Click on that icon. Under where it says “share to” there is a section with more options for the video. Scroll until you find the trash can icon and click it. It will ask if you are sure you want to delete the video. Press confirm, and all history of the video, such as likes and comments will be erased.

To delete a TikTok video that you have posted to your account, select the video you want to delete from your profile. From there, tap the "..." icon in the bottom-right corner and select Delete or the trash can icon. You will be asked if you are sure you want to delete the video.

How do I delete a TikTok video? To delete a TikTok video that you have posted to your account, select the video you want to delete from your profile. From there, tap the "..." icon in the bottom-right corner and select Delete or the trash can icon. You will be asked if you are sure you want to delete the video. Then it will be removed from your profile.  Please Upvote If You Like…..Thanks,,,,

ty4ta2a Can Tik Tok videos be deleted? Yes of course they can- you have full cotrol over that with the app; HOWEVER, if anyone has downloaded the video in question or cross post shared it to say facebook or instagram or even sent it as a message to a friend -not associated with Tik-Tok - they will have a copy of the video at the very least in their cache.

response.answer_text: You look to the bottom right corner that says “me.” Then you click on that and it shows your profile and videos. You click the video you’d like to delete, and on the right side there are 3 dots in a row. Click that. Then you can scroll through the “Share to” options. Delete video is the last/end of the scroll.
